sect2.title: Installation de db-3.3.11
sect2.para: Installez db-3.3.11 en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput: cd build_unix && ../dist/configure --prefix=/usr --enable-compat185 \ --enable-static --enable-shared && make docdir=/usr/doc/Berkeley-DB all install && cd /usr/lib/ && ln -sf libdb-3.3.a libdb.a && sed 's/^DB185/DB/' /usr/include/db_185.h > /usr/include/db_185.h.new && mv /usr/include/db_185.h.new /usr/include/db_185.h
